titleStmt.title: The school of patience. Written in Latin by H. Drexelius. And faithfully translated into English, by R.S. Gent
Gymnasium patientiae. English
titleStmt.author: Drexel, Jeremias, 1581-1638.
R. S., gent.
Stanford, Robert, attributed name.
Marshall, William, fl. 1617-1650, engraver.

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved, signed: W. Marshall sculpsit.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
